text: dehaatiyo mein se jo log piche chohd diye gaye thein, wo ab tujh se kahenge ke hum apne maal aur baal baccho mein lage reh gaye, pas aap hamaare liye maghfirath talab kijiye, ye log apni zabaano se wo kehte hai jo un ke dilo mein nahi hai, aap jawaab de dijiye ke tumhaare liye Allah ki taraf se kisi cheez ka bhi eqtiyaar kaun rakhta hai, agar wo tumhe nuqsaan pahochana chaahe to, ya tumhe koyi nafa dena chaahe to, balke tum jo kuch kar rahe ho, us se Allah qoob ba qabar hai
